name: RandFloat
RandNum
JSON or URL Encoded
Daten Auslesen und Konvertieren
Hinweis
info:
Der Mikrocontroller sendet einen GET Request an die Domain http://(IP des eigenen Rechners):1880/sendDummyData.

Dabei werden ein paar Daten angehängt.
Diese können dann in der Funktion über den Message Payload abgefragt werden.

Die Funktion kann als Vorlage für den eigentlichen Server verwendet werden oder einfach nur zum Testen.

name: FK muss bei jedem INSERT aktiviert werden
CREATE user
topic: CREATE TABLE user( userid INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, password TEXT, lastname TEXT NOT NULL, firstName TEXT NOT NULL, admin BOOLEAN NOT NULL, permission INTEGER NOT NULL, company TEXT )

name: CREATE machine
topic: CREATE TABLE machine( machineName TEXT PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL, permission INTEGER NOT NULL, setUpTime INTEGER NOT NULL, cost INTEGER NOT NULL, materialConsumption INTEGER , area TEXT, factor INTEGER NOT NULL )

name: CREATE data
topic: CREATE TABLE data( userid INTEGER NOT NULL, machineName TEXT NOT NULL, start INTEGER NOT NULL, end INTEGER NOT NULL, duration INTEGER NOT NULL, power INTEGER NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (userid, machineName ) FOREIGN KEY(userid) REFERENCES user(userid), FOREIGN KEY(machineName) REFERENCES machine(machineName) )

name: INSERT user
topic: INSERT INTO user(password, lastname, firstName, admin, permission, company) VALUES( 12345, "mustermann", "muster", true, 5, NULL)

name: INSERT machine
topic: INSERT INTO machine VALUES("test maschine", 2, 5, 0.99, NULL, "holz", 1)

name: Select Data
func:
var msg = { "topic": "SELECT machineName, start, end, duration, power FROM user JOIN data USING (userid) WHERE userid =" + msg.payload +"  ORDER BY start "}

return msg;

name: Select Data
func:
var msg = { "topic": "SELECT userid, start, end, duration, power FROM data JOIN machine USING (machineName) WHERE machineName = '"+ msg.payload +"' ORDER BY start "}

return msg;

name: Select Data
func:
var msg = { "topic": "SELECT *  FROM user where userid=" + msg.payload +"" };

return msg;

name: Persönliche Daten eines Nutzers zurück geben:
CheckPassword
checkingPassFunk
CheckUserExists
func:
var msg = { "topic": "SELECT true FROM user WHERE userid =" + global.get("loginUserid") +" "}

return msg;
